channel.title: How to make Customs[PI]
channel.description: I've received a lot of requests from players to make a custom in server a black party hat so im wondering if someone can help me out how would i make that custom its a [PI] hybridpvp V3

item.title: How to make Customs[PI]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Ermm… I forgot… wait for someone who knows…

Read full topic

item.title: How to make Customs[PI]
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

alright so i found it but how do i make it so others can see it on my head and it shows up in the helm slot not weapon

case 15152:
itemDef.modelid = 2635;
itemDef.name = “Black Party-Hat”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 280;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
itemDef.stackable = false;
itemDef.value = 1;
itemDef.membersObject = true;
itemDef.anInt165 = 187;
itemDef.anInt200 = 363;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[1];
itemDef.newModelColor = new int[1];
itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = 926;
itemDef.newModelColor[0] = 1;
break;

Read full topic

item.title: How to make Customs[PI]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Not really no, customs are not my thing, I used to use an un-edited PI source, which was very hard to do, but just add these ints to your itemDef.java client sided. You don’t HAVE TO T.V! Thats all you junior members ever wanna do, you will nver learn that way.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

you do not have to add the dat files dipshit if he has the red partyhat already in his server then the dat files are there, it goes in itemdef.java
if the hat turns invisible change the 0 to a 1 and try

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

itemDef.java, or itemDef2.java, you also have to add the .dat files to your cache.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make Customs[PI]
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

case 15152:
	itemDef.modelid = 2635;
	itemDef.name = "Black Party-Hat";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
	itemDef.modelRotationY = 280;
	itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
	itemDef.stackable = false;
	itemDef.value = 1;
	itemDef.membersObject = true;
	itemDef.anInt165 = 187;
	itemDef.anInt200 = 363;
	itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
	itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[1];
	itemDef.newModelColor = new int[1];
	itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = 926;
	itemDef.newModelColor[0] = 0;
	break;

This is the one i use in my servers, very easy and very common!

Read full topic
